plot: The film includes moments from Price's Milton class, interactions and interviews with students and friends. Archival footage of Price's teachers, with William Styron, and reflections on pedagogical influences weave the narrative together.
title: Pass it On
plot_es: The film includes moments from Price's Milton class, interactions and interviews with students and friends. Archival footage of Price's teachers, with William Styron, and reflections on pedagogical influences weave the narrative together.
